This is the about me page.
Credits This blog wouldn’t exist without the following tools and inspirations:
Hugo Tailwind CSS giscus Theme Dependencies adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod because of the module import in hugo.yaml, if this project would be used by malicous actors this page would be affected as well.
summary:
This is the about me page.

Credits

This blog wouldn’t exist without the following tools and inspirations:

  • Hugo
  • Tailwind CSS
  • giscus

Theme Dependencies

  • adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod because of the module import in hugo.yaml, if this project would be used by malicous actors this page would be affected as well.
